field.name: ajxp_install_path
field.label: AjaXplorer Install Path
field.description: Path to your AjaXplorer installation (absolute path on server)

field.name: ajxp_secret_key
field.label: Secret Key
field.description: The secret key defined in your AjaXplorer plugin auth.remote configuration (see conf.php).

field.label: Auto Create Users
field.description: Create AjaXplorer user automatically at login, not only via the Joomla administration interface.
